copySelectedPuretext.description: feature - Copy text without HTML format of selected context.

copySelectedHtmltext.description: feature - Copy HTML source text of selected context.

copyPagePuretext.description: feature - Copy text without HTML format of full page.

copyPageHtmltext.description: feature - Copy HTML source text of full page.

copyLinkName.description: feature - Copy name of this Link.

copyLinkUrl.description: feature - Copy URL of this Link.

copyLinkFormatText.description: feature - Copy name & URL as custom format text of this Link.

copyImageUrl.description: feature - Copy URL of this Image.

showImage.description: feature - Open Image on new Tab.

copyTabName.description: feature - Copy name of this Tab.

copyTabUrl.description: feature - Copy URL of this Tab.

copyTabFormatText.description: feature - Copy name & URL as custom format text of this Tab.

copySelectedUrls.description: feature - Analyze selected context to find URLs, copy all as custom format text.

openSelectedUrls.description: feature - Analyze selected context to find URLs, open all to new Tabs.

copyPageUrls.description: feature - Analyze full page to find URLs, copy all as custom format text.

openPageUrls.description: feature - Analyze full page to find URLs, open all to new Tabs.

copySelectedImageUrls.description: feature - Analyze selected context to find image URLs, copy all as custom format text.

showSelectedImages.description: feature - Analyze selected context to find image URLs, open all to new Tabs.

copyPageImageUrls.description: feature -  Analyze full page to find image URLs, copy all as custom format text.

showPageImages.description: feature - Analyze full page to find image URLs, open all to new Tabs.

tabsLimitAlert.message: Слишком много URL-адресов, открыты только первые {0} вкладок.
tabsLimitAlert.description: message - Max tabs limit at once open.

resetSettings.description: UI button - reset to default settings.

puretextFormatDelAroundSpace.description: UI setting - [Copy as pure text - format] - Delete context around space.(trim)

puretextFormatDelInvisibleSpace.description: UI setting - [Copy as pure text - format] - Delete invisible space.

puretextFormatConvertQuotation.message: Преобразовывать все типы кавычек в обычные
puretextFormatConvertQuotation.description: UI setting - [Copy as pure text - format] - Convert all type quotation to normal quotation.

puretextFormatConvertApostrophe.message: Преобразовывать все типы апострофов в обычный
puretextFormatConvertApostrophe.description: UI setting - [Copy as pure text - format] - Convert all type apostrophe to normal apostrophe.

puretextFormatConvertDash.message: Преобразовывать все типы тире в обычное
puretextFormatConvertDash.description: UI setting - [Copy as pure text - format] - Convert all type dash to normal dash.

puretextFormatConvertSpace.description: UI setting - [Copy as pure text - format - Convert fullwidth space to normal space.

puretextFormatMergeNewline.description: UI setting - [Copy as pure text - format] - Merge newline.

puretextFormatMergeSpace.description: UI setting - [Copy as pure text - format] - Merge space.

puretextFormatMergeFullwidthSpace.description: UI setting - [Copy as pure text - format] - Merge fullwidth space.

puretextFormatMergeTabulation.description: UI setting - [Copy as pure text - format] - Merge tabulation.

puretextFormatMergeAllTypeSpace.message: Объединять все типы пробелов в один пробел
puretextFormatMergeAllTypeSpace.description: UI setting - [Copy as pure text - format] - Merge all type space to one space.

htmltextFormatWithoutTag.description: UI setting - [Copy as pure text - format] - Copy without HTML Tag.

linkCustomFormat.description: UI setting - [Copy Link info - Format] - Link custom format for copy feature.

tabCustomFormat.description: UI setting - [Copy Tab info - Format] - Tab custom format for copy feature.

tabsinfoCustomFormat.message: Пользовательский формат информации о всех вкладках:
tabsinfoCustomFormat.description: UI setting - [Copy Tab info - Format] - Copy all Tabs info custom format.

fixUrlQuotEnd.description: UI setting - [Analyze URLs] - fix URLs end with quotation.

urlsCustomFormat.description: UI setting - [Analyze URLs] - Copy URLs custom format.

imageUrlsCustomFormat.description: UI setting - [Analyze URLs] - Copy Image URLs custom format.

maxTabsLimit.description: UI setting - [Analyze URLs] - Max tabs limit at once open.

openOneImageDirectly.message: Открывать ссылку на единственное изображение напрямую
openOneImageDirectly.description: UI setting - [Analyze URLs] - Open a single Image link directly.

blobUrlToLocal.message: Преобразовывать Blob URL в локальные URL-адреса (очень медленно)
blobUrlToLocal.description: UI setting - [Analyze URLs] - Blob URL transfer to local URL.

toolbarButtonAction.description: UI setting - [Toolbar button] - Toolbar button action.

keyboardShortcutAction.description: UI setting - [keybord shortcut] - keyboard shortcut action.
